statements: UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET trip_distance = 150.25, average_speed = 65.3 WHERE driver_id = 101 AND trip_date = '2022-01-10';
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET average_speed = 60.5, trip_distance = 140.75 WHERE driver_id = 201 AND trip_date = '2022-02-15';
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET average_speed = 35.6, trip_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE driver_id = 123
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET trip_distance = 120.75, average_speed = 40.2 WHERE driver_id = 456
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET total_distance_covered = 1500, average_speed = 55.5 WHERE driver_id = 1234;
UPDATE coaching_feedback SET feedback_message = 'Great job!', feedback_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE driver_id = 5678;
UPDATE driver_performance_metrics SET average_speed = 60.5, total_distance_covered = 5000 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE coaching_feedback SET feedback_message = 'Great job on improving your speed', feedback_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE driver_id = 102;
UPDATE drivers SET total_distance = 1000, total_time = 50 WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE trips SET time_taken = 45, distance_covered = 800 WHERE trip_id = 10;
UPDATE drivers SET total_distance = total_distance + 1000, total_time = total_time + 60 WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE trips SET distance_covered = 500, time_taken = 30 WHERE trip_id = 101;
UPDATE DriverPerformanceMetrics SET total_distance = 500.25, speed_limit_exceeded = 10 WHERE driver_id = 123;
UPDATE CoachingFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job on your last trip!', feedback_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE driver_id = 456;
UPDATE DriverPerformanceMetrics SET total_distance = total_distance + 1000, speed_limit_exceeded = 5 WHERE driver_id = 123 AND date = '2022-06-15';
UPDATE CoachingFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great improvement on speed control', feedback_date = '2022-06-20' WHERE driver_id = 456 AND coaching_session_id = 789;
UPDATE drivers SET driver_name = 'John Doe', driver_phone = '123-456-7890' WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE trips SET trip_distance = 100.5, trip_duration = '1 hour' WHERE trip_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE drivers SET driver_phone = '+1234567890', driver_license = 'D123456' WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE feedback SET feedback_message = 'Great job on your recent trips!' WHERE driver_id = '98765432-12ab-cdef-1234-567890acbdfe';
